author: mrdon
msg: First cut at a simple plugin framework.  The config files are loaded in the following order:
struts-default.xml, struts-plugin.xml, struts.xml, xwork.xml.  This allows plugins to define
a config file that uses core interceptors, but make their results, interceptors, etc available
to application configurations.  The extras and integration modules have been decomposed into their

author: jmcconnell
msg: remove the user creation hack from teh configuration screen and action

author: pyang
msg: Apply patch with modifications for HARMONY-1349 ([classlib][html] Compatibility: The values stored in the public field type of j.s.t.h.p.Entity are different from those used in the RI)
